name: Till you do us part
description:
You finally went and found yourself a boyfriend, the only problem is he's the Grim Reaper, and tonight he is coming to dinner to meet your family!

Although the visual novel is still in the first phases of development, it will have multiple endings
As per Alpha 0.1, the VN still features no sound at all and only contains the opening section, where your choices don't matter as much as they will in the whole game, but I still encourage you to explore the few possibilities that are already here and to comment to let me know what you think about it!

Keep in  mind that because of the game's nature there will be discussion of death in the final release, even though no death scenes are ever displayed

This game would not be possible without:
Exuin's character builder
NoranekoGames' backgrounds
Ren'py VN engine
sutemo's character sprites
https://favpng.com for some of the graphics
u/archtech88 and the r/WritingPrompts subreddit for the ploy idea
